Html.content: Below is a figure of folders in the VFS which each embody the top level of a language specific sub-site. On the other hand these folders belong to the sub-site called site and are to deliver content in three different languages. On each of these folders the locale property should be set so that all child folders, pages and resources inherit the locale of the parent folder unless they define them individually. The locale property will be used by OpenCms to assign specific XML-Contents and can be accessed in a JSP among other.
